Comments: I received a Promo Code for March so I will have to wait till March to complete my order.
Great value, great site! Super easy to navigate and find great books at great prices for specific ages
It's not clear how to remove a book from the shopping cart.
The book my daughter wanted was out of stock.

Hard to find thebook titles - have to toggle back and forth from cart to flyers and open them up and figure out cost and/or bonus points.  I have so many books after 42 years of teaching I do not place orders anymore.  I usually buy books at school book fair or Target.  The prices and selection have gotten very limited on Scholastic.
I would like to be able to buy the 18.00 book (the 10.00 for ordering at least 25.00 in books and then use my teacher points for the rest instead for being charged the remaining 8.00).
You are my favorite place to get books to give to students - they love getting their own book to take home.  Thank you for making it affordable to encourage a love of reading!
I don't often find it easy to find books I am interested in.
The experiance was very easy.  I dont know if these codes are good for me to order at different times or can I use them  whenever? I

Coupons are not available on the site that are available on the parents site… However, the parent site does not contribute to classrooms and is more expensive than the club prices… That is a little disappointing
Wondering if you could offer more books with CD's.  I love your books. Thanks for what you do!
Site works, but is not super smooth to use
I had flyers and my great grandson and I picked out what books he wanted.
Couldnt find the series shadow house horror books
Everything went smoothly.
Love that there are so many additional books available on the website!
Was ok
book was not available
will come back and order another day! Just don't have time to really look.

I saw the email about "Whosh" and I have always loved that book so I had to have it. Ordered a bunch with my points. I love Scholastic and wish my students' families would order but I'm at least glad I can. :-)

You used to have prices much lower than other sites (ie: Amazon).  That is no longer the case.  I've been disappointed that last few times I've tried to order books for my classroom.  In addition, my students do not have a lot of money and really can't afford most of your books.  :(
The more I use the site the easier it is.
I was looking for my order history and even chatted with someone but didn't get what I needed.

It would be nice to know not just the tracking number of our book box, but the infonotice number as well.  We are experiencing winter alerts causing schools to close, so I would like to change the delivery of our bookbox date.  We cannot do that in UPS with just the tracking number.  We need the infonotice number as well.
Popups that got blocked
Love that some of these book prices are much cheaper than the books anywhere else!
the digital flyers wont show up

I had to request  some help from Amy in the chat box.  The order was not going through until she had me enter a 1 in the box where they ask how many studebts ordered the preview product. The truth is, there were no students ordering the preview but I was advised to enter the number 1 and then the order went through.     Why is that? It didn't make sense to me.
The Scholastic site is always easy to use!  I always love that I am able to get books for my classroom library with coupons and codes!  Thank you!
books shown on the email for teacher packs 5 for $5 were not available.  If not the same books, a disclaimer should be at the bottom of the graphic.
I love Scholastic Book Clubs!
Checkout process has too many steps and is not intuitive.
I had difficulty, after searching, returning to the first page to see what else the teacher had in her wish list
it could be better optimized for mobile
Still never received a stool from rewards I used a long time ago and never resolved after many messages to and from scholastic.
Great books. I  like the bundles you have.
It is hard for me to choose which books that I want with my Bonus points.
It would be nice to be able to combine the $10.00 rewards and shop for them all at once instead of in seperate transactions.  Thank you for fixing the shipping issues that were occurring last year.

I know working through the pandemic and getting orders out in a timely manner was just as stressful for you as for teachers and families. Thank you so much for staying the course and returning to the awesome service Scholastic provided teachers and families. I'm so thankful that we have a reliable resource to keep our libraries refreshed.
I have not completed the process. It already says I get no points for the order - wondering why that is??  I have tried to find certain books and you don't have them.
Site would not let me login to order books
I have $25 on a gift card that I would like to add to a wallet for my kids to use at the book fair but I don’t  seem to be able to do that .

I had a difficult time at first finding the books I was looking for in the desired reading level/age range for my child. As a book lover, I found it a bit discouraging there were not books for the parents to purchase as well.
I was disappointed that a discount that was advertised on the site was not able to be applied despite hitting the price minimum.
I am looking for new books to order for my classroom.  I am dissapointed by the selection of  books.  The quality of literature available is not what it used to be on the Scholastic site.
enjoyable
I appreciate your books being fair priced. I was able to get books for 15 state funded PreK classrooms.
I love the ease that Scholastic offers when it comes to getting books to my families and to my classroom.
So glad orders are back to normal!

I love the process, so easy now that I have an account.  Love it that it has his teacher info pre-populated.  So easy to find books.  My son uses his allowance if I've gotten him books elsewhere recently so it contributes to his understanding of money, the value of money and saving.
Great experiences ordering books for students and classroom from Scholastic Book Clubs
I would like an area for cheaper books in a certain theme. For example I was going to buy books for St. Patrick's Day. I wanted to find books that matched the theme for a less expensive price.

virtual flyers did not always appear when I needed them to

I love the selection on books at great prices that can't be beat.
I love scholastic! Your books and prices are very comparable to other websites with books.

Working on getting a $25 order of books together for free shipping and to use the coupon code Reads.  Unfortunately the series I normally get as my sons free book has increased in price and is now outside of the coupon code.

The shift seems to be moving towards electronic book orders, but we've found ever time we try that, parents just don't order like they do when a paper book order is sent home. That being said, for some reason we are only receiving 1 book order option a month and it often arrives once the month has already started. Is there a way to notify you that we'd like to receive all preschool and toddler options? I know you're spread thin and really appreciate the help!
Difficult to navigate adding the Free $5 book using my smart phone internet app.
Customer service representative on live chat was helpful.
I tried to log in and it wouldn't let me at first. I had to reopen the website in order to log in
Each time I use the Scholastic Books website to enter classroom book orders, it is a quick and easy task.  I appreciate that you are prompted to pick your $10 worth of free books.
love this site

We love ordering our books from you for are class !

Order went smoothly!

WIth the economy the way it is I wish Scholastic would bring back $1 books so they are more afforable to kids. Excellent source of affordable books for children.

Perfect

n/a

Although I love to have my students order books, the last couple of years have had some frustrations.  Although all the materials I purchase are all for classroom use and we have a tax exempt certificate on file, I struggle to get the tax removed.  Also, because I cannot see payment history, I can't always figure out why I have a balance.
the only thing i wish you would send the orders with a rubber band around the books with the students name with it.    thank you
Easy to use site, love it!

I am consistently not getting orders from families because of the high prices of the books, in fact I had to make this months order completely on my own :(   Scholastic has always been known as a place where a parent could get a book for $1, $2, or $3...but now the prices look more like $5, $7, & $10. Parents cannot afford to spend that kind of money. Surely you want to encourage literacy growth, as do I...so I think some consideration should be given to the prices that are currently being offered. At least offer a few lower priced books.   Also as a teacher, I never have a $75 order, so I never get access to the $1 deals.
Cut the books promoting the LGTBQ agenda!
Love the dollar books!
The site is great and shipments are arriving quickly!

I type in a code for a book my daughter wanted and it no longer leads to a book. It must be from a previous book order form and I suppose the code to link to that book expired when the book went back to original price, but now I don't even know which book it was. Could you keep the codes set up to the book... or at least create a window that says, "The book, ________________________, is no longer on a sale" so that we as the parents at least know what book it is. My daughter knows to copy the codes down but now I couldn't purchase the book because it doesn't lead to a book anymore. The code was 3K4.
very user friendly, and all the info I need

Is there a way to still make an order on something that is currently out of stock, so it can be sent when the stock is replenished? I would like to have a search option added to the teacher order. It offers only to search by item number or grade level. I would like to be able to search by title, subject, or author.  Also, it would be so helpful to exhausted, busy teachers, (who are usually sorting incoming orders late in the evening), to have the books arrive presorted. I dread when this order arrives because I have a large teacher order, and I know my books will be thrown in a box randomly with all of the students' orders. I am then left to sort them out using the printout of the orders with the teeny tiny print. Earlier in the year when we had a large order, there was no packing material in the box to protect the books, and some of the books received some wear and tear during their delivery journey.
I have been using this site to purchase all of my kids book from their school. I love it because its so easy to use.

easy to use.  my kids are always so excited for book orders.  I also like that our teacher gets points toward free books.  (I hope this is still happening!). Teacher placed order on December 5, 2022. I'm here on site checking on status on Feb 16, 2023.  I'm having issues understanding the length of time of 11 weeks to arrive at grandchild's school. I have been ordering books for my own children growing up and now my grandkids and I don't ever recall waiting this long on books that's been "in transient" to school in 31 years. I'm kind of disappointed and could have ordered from Feb flyers but held off from future purchases until this order has been delivered. I would not be so concern if it did not show "in transient to school" for many weeks. This is NOT a teacher issue. I'm sure she and other parents who ordered are wondering as well in regards to their order.    Hopefully the books will show up in class within the week.

I used to LOVE Scholastic book orders.  My classroom library is pretty much consists entirely of books that I have obtained from this site.  However, I have been disappointed in Scholastic ever since the COVID-19 shutdowns, etc.      Last school year, I placed an order in November, I believe, but didn't receive the box until January.  I also had a student who never received her item, never received a refund, never heard anything about her item that wasn't delivered.  I tried multiple times to contact customer service and the issue was never resolved.    This year, it seems like a lot of the items that kids really want are "Out of Stock" or "No longer available".  This is frustrating because I'm trying to order things for my kids who are so excited about what special item they have chosen from the flyers.  Only for them to turn around and be so sad and disappointed that the item is not an option anymore.  I'm trying to place an order today and it's still February and the items are in th

I love scholastic since I was a kid! Now I get to share the same joy and excitement of ordering books with my kids. Thanks to this program, I developed the love for reading. Thank you!

The site needs improvement in my opinion. I wish that when I "add" a book to my cart the message of "continue shopping or view cart " would not appear. It makes me angry when I see it. OR I wish I were able to click out side the box to make it go away. Anything is better than to have to click exactly on the "continue shopping" box.   Also, you need to find a way to add the TAX to the student flyer. I am paying out of pocket when I order for my kids. Not every student wants to create an account so I do the orders for them. AND NO WHERE on the student flyer appears the add TAX to the order. So, Why should I pay TAX on when you do not have a box to know that they need to pay TAXES on their items.   The fact that I have to remind the parents to add money to pay taxes or that I have to pay for it because I want my kids to get their books makes me NOT WANT TO ORDER ANY because it creates more work for me.   So, no. I don't want to deal with taxes.
